overview: Helix continues to break new ground with this sex soaked, sci-fi saga! Spectacular specimen, Seth Peterson is stuck in a lusty loop, reliving the same day over and over. After a bit, Seth catches on to the rules of this wild ride, and uses the time bender to his advantage, smashing ass left and right! Through some serious cock sucking, ass licking, butt banging adventures with good buddies, Peterson learns some lessons. He uses these lessons to rectify a naughty high school prank he pulled on a poor, unsuspecting pretty boy. Does sexy Seth get the guy in the end; or, will the same day repeat forever? Find out in Helix’s epic saga, “Unraveled.”
title: Unraveled
